I have a scenario where refusing to help someone makes guard npc apear to move you out of the room. That works fine. From there, player getts moves away when trying to re-enter the room.  Also works. 

But after that, i want player tobe able to interact with the guards like any other npc. Problem is: the object isnt properly showing up in game. Ever after removing 'make object visible/invisible' from the equation.
